segments.text: I'm glad that you can make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It looks like there are a lot of people inside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I've invited a lot of friends besides you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I take my shoes off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We all keep our shoes on indoors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They've gone out so that we could have the house to ourselves .
segments.speaker: S2
